segments.Segment: i was so excited to see the concert
but
it was postponed until next year
my mom told me she would be home by five but she is still not here at six
i was surprised when my teacher gave me an a on my test
the news about the natural disaster is devastating
my brother took my video game controller and broke it
i cannot believe i failed my math test
i just found out that my favorite band is coming to town
and i am totally stoked
my dog ran away
and now i am feeling really upset
i was so startled
when the door slammed shut
when i saw the snake in the grass
i jumped and screamed
my dog ran away
but luckily we found him a few hours later
i just saw a cute puppy
i was so scared to go skydiving
but it turned out to be an amazing experience
the haunted house was so scary
i almost peed my pants
the test was way harder than i thought it would be
and now i am worried i failed
the roller coaster was so much fun
but then i rode it again
and it made me sick
my dog just ran away
and now i am really worried
my friend borrowed my favorite video game
and now it is broken
i got invited to a party
this
weekend
but i do not have anything to wear
my friend
invited
me to a
party
but then she texted me that it was a joke and i felt so embarrassed
my cats death made me feel sad
my cat is really sick and i am really worried about him
my dog is so cute
he always puts a smile on my face
the haunted house was really scary
but the actor who jumped out at me was kind of hot
my
mom
is
going to be mad when she finds
out
i
broke the vase
i hate it when my mom tells me what to wear
but i guess she is just trying to help
the roller coaster was so fun
but then it suddenly stopped
and now i am terrified
i was so excited for the concert
but when i got there i realized i had left my tickets at home
my teacher gave me a surprise pop quiz
and i was not prepared
but i am proud of myself for doing well
i got a new job offer
and i am really happy about it
but the commute is going to be
terrible
i woke up late for work
and had to speed to get there on time
but i got a flat tire
my friend just told me a joke
that was so funny
it made
me laugh
out loud
i just saw a snake in the park
i just saw a spider crawling across my desk
and it freaked me out
my teacher gave me a lot of homework
and now i am stressed
i saw a snake in my backyard
and it totally freaked me out
my cat loves to sit on my lap while i am studying
but it is really distracting
my little brother is being really annoying right now and i am starting to get mad
the beach was beautiful
and had such clear water
the teacher
gave me a really hard math problem
and i
do
not
know how to do it
the cake was delicious
but also very rich
the
cashier gave me a rude look when i
tried to pay with a
card
my friend told me a joke
that was so funny
that i spit out my drink
i love watching the sunset
my cat wakes me up every morning by pouncing on my face
the haunted house was so scary that i did not even want to go inside
my
dad told me to clean my room
i hate public speaking
but i guess it is important for my career
i was angry that my brother took my video game
i was watching a scary movie
but then i saw a spider crawling on the wall and i freaked
out
my mom was so mad at me for breaking the vase
but i did not mean to
my brother lied to me again
i
do
not know why i
am
still surprised
i got an a on my math test
but the teacher took off points for
bad
handwriting
i was so excited to try skydiving
but i chickened out
my friends joke was really funny
but it also made me a little uncomfortable
i am so glad i finally finished that project
the traffic jam caused me to be late for work
my boss just gave me a promotion
and i
am really excited about it
i cannot believe i won the lottery
i am so excited
but i know i have to be careful with my winnings
i studied hard for the test
but i am still worried that i am going to fail
i had a fun time at the arcade
my crush just asked me out
i just saw the funniest video
ever
i just saw a snake in my backyard
and it scared me so much
i cannot believe i finally got tickets to see my favorite band
but they are playing on a tuesday
and i have work the next day
my brother borrowed my car without asking and returned it with a dented fender
but
he also left a gift on my doorstep as an apology
my little brother is always getting into trouble
and it is really stressing me out
the line for the bathroom is now moving at a snails pace

the roller coaster was really fun
but it
also
made me feel a bit sick
my teacher gave me a really hard math problem
in front of
the
whole class
my friend cancelled our plans at the last minute which really annoyed me
the movie was really scary
i saw a snake on my hike
and it startled me
the joke was so funny
my dog loves to play with his toys
but sometimes he gets really carried away and starts barking loudly
the amusement park ride made me really dizzy
the roller coaster was really fun
but also kind of terrifying
